data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Canonical demand identity spanning fulfillment demand, staffing demand, and custom/plugin demand". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Staffing Demand with Canonical Auction Link. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.bodyText:
{
  "stepKey": "owner-calendar-review",
  "callCount": 1,
  "calls": [
    {
      "method": "POST",
      "path": "/api/v1/bizes/3AANOtDXOGsGaUpzX73HD2ghtPf/offers/offer_3AANPnePORf3obpoWMmIArwe6K2/versions",
      "status": 201,
      "requestBody": {
        "version": 1,
        "status": "published",
        "durationMode": "fixed",
        "defaultDurationMin": 50,
        "basePriceMinor": 15000,
        "currency": "USD"
      },
      "responseBody": {
        "success": true,
        "data": {
